text: Imnyama yula mkali yumonile, tsakakala mghima, lekeni sambi si mghima keli bae, ila kahabehi kutsa kulawa kune lipondo lilihela utsighilo, naye katsokomighwa. Na wanu iwokala muisi, awala mataghwa ghawo ng'ana ghandikighwe bae mne chitabu cha ughima kulawa isi hailumbighwe watsokangawala hawatsomwona imnyama ayo mkali, kwaapfila ghumwande tsakamghima, sambi si mghima bae, lekeni katsolawila keli.
